title: DPhil Candidate
description: Thesis: Electrode Design for Localised Cortical Stimulation - A Computational Study

title: Research Intern
description: Contributed to the research and development of methods, such as regularisation, to adapt models in the fine-tuning stage to improve outcomes on standardised fairness metrics

title: Engineering Intern
description: Contributed to the research development and engineering of a data flywheel to support under-represented communities by building a platform to responsibly collate data and develop deep learning models for classifying and generating long-tail concepts

title: Ideathon Programme
description: Chair: 2025. Assist in planning and managing the programme to facilitate research and application-based projects on the African continent

title: Chair: Communications Committee

title: Software Engineer (Part-time)
description: Created unique algorithms to generate business insights based on the inference of deep learning models on CCTV footage. These were deployed to production in June 2021

title: Cognitive Systems Neuroscience Internship
description: Built data processing pipeline in MATLAB for Granger causal analysis to decode neural communication pathways during attention and decision-making tasks. Analysed high-frequency electrocorticography (ECoG) data from macaques. Implemented parallel processing loops to reduce analysis time from days to hours.

title: Chair: Mentorship Programme
description: We have facilitated > 600 successful matches, with many success stories of papers being accepted and mentees successfully getting into postgraduate programmes

title: Data Science Internship
description: Developed an automated feedback loop for assessment of model accuracy in automatic labelling of fruit. These labelled data and models laid the foundation for further investigation into methods for automated assessment and is an open question

title: Master's Degree: Biomedical Engineering Research Group
description: Thesis: Determining the nature of free will using machine learning

title: Community Service Physiotherapist
description: Frontline clinical physiotherapist, working in multidisciplinary teams in high-pressured departments such as adult and neonatal intensive care units and out-patient departments

title: Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPhysT)
description: Thesis: The effect of positive expiratory pressure on the airway hyper-reactivity in the partially controlled to uncontrolled adult asthma patient
